vote.title: Authorize a public hearing to be held on March 27, 2024, pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of Bachman Creek Greenbelt located at 3900 Shorecrest Drive, by Dallas Water Utilities for the construction of an 8-inch wastewater line totaling approximately 1,682 square feet of land, and a 30-inch stormwater line totaling approximately 1,580 square feet of land, for the public benefit and execution of a development agreement with UG Bluffview LP for the reconstruction of trail affected by the easement  - Financing: No cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
